channel.title: Auto Cache Downloader (really need help please)
channel.description: Hey guys im trying to make an auto-cache for my 317 client..i make a zip files for my cache and i do every thing they said...change the url in ur cachedownloader.java, change in ur signlink.java the string s...for my new cache name and i compile..but when i delete my cache and trying to run my client again to download my new cache it wont work still say error retry in 5,4,3,2,1 still doing it...[url=http://postimg.org/image/yawynd2hl/][img]http://s12.postimg.org/yawynd2hl/Capture_d_cran_2014_03_16_14_53_16.jpg[/img][/url]...i think its my cache...look at it [url=http://postimg.org/image/3z8k6oj8d/][img]http://s30.postimg.org/3z8k6oj8d/Capture_d_cran_2014_03_16_15_00_04.jpg[/img][/url]...got teamviewer please someone help me!

@soulfear1234 wrote:

Damn i forgot to delete my pm :palm: thank you for your help!

item.title: Auto Cache Downloader (really need help please)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

This depends on your server, this should already be implemented in your client, just add the CRC checks server-sided and send the byte streams of the updated cache files as required.

I would recommend reading about the login block. Then continue with the JAGGRAB Protocol which is used to download the cache files from the file server. Finish off with the OnDemand Protocol which handles the file streaming from the server to client.

ps: Odds are your server has this implemented and you just need to toggle it, good luck.

Read full topic
